code: import axios from"axios";export var createPlaylist=function createPlaylist(playlist){return axios.post("/api/playlists/create",playlist);};export var addSongToPlaylist=function addSongToPlaylist(songId,playlistId){var data={songId:songId};return axios.patch("/api/playlists/addto/".concat(playlistId),data);};export var fetchUserPlaylists=function fetchUserPlaylists(userId){return axios.get("/api/users/".concat(userId,"/playlists"));};export var fetchPlaylist=function fetchPlaylist(playlistId){return axios.get("/api/playlists/".concat(playlistId));};export var deletePlaylist=function deletePlaylist(playlistData){return axios.delete("/api/playlists/delete/".concat(playlistData.playlistId));};export var renamePlaylist=function renamePlaylist(playlistData){return axios.patch("/api/playlists/rename/".concat(playlistData.playlistId),playlistData);};//to routes
